name: Shimla Hilltop Resort
description: Luxury resort with panoramic views of the Himalayas

roomTypes.name: Deluxe
roomTypes.description: Spacious room with private balcony and mountain views

roomTypes.name: Premium Suite
roomTypes.description: Luxury suite with separate living area and panoramic views

reviews.author: Rahul Sharma
reviews.comment: Incredible views and excellent service. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.author: Priya Malhotra
reviews.comment: Beautiful property with great food. The room was a bit small though.

reviews.author: Aditya Singh
reviews.comment: The sound of the river from our cottage was therapeutic. Great food and activities.

reviews.author: Meera Patel
reviews.comment: Excellent location and service, but Wi-Fi was a bit spotty.

reviews.author: Vikram Mehta
reviews.comment: Incredible ambiance and the most peaceful stay I've had in years.
